TopicTitle: The Grand Orbital Space Station Challenge [closed to new entries]

Articles.Content:
Wooo Orbital Stations!

I'll be sure to keep my eyes open if there is a new scoring system/challenge, I reckon macro scale engineering can solve most issues!

Note that changes were made to OP regarding the future of this challenge (.....that there will not be one!!). Thanks to those that entered recently and all those that made this thread so great.

All the best,

Glaran

Edited November 10, 2015 by Glaran K'erman
I'm sad to see it go, and I'm not able to continue it as well.
